text: okay. alright everybody, it's time to eat.  oh lord, we thank you for this meal, all your bounty, and we pray that you help sheldon get back on his rocker.  now after a moment of silent meditation i'm going to end with "in jesus' name" but you two don't feel any obligation to join in. unless, of course, the holy spirit moves you.
